lead_paragraph: South Carolina coach Dawn Staley thinks Connecticut's Breanna Stewart is a sublime player and competitor who has transcended the game. Staley would know, having redefined point guard play as the game's best player a quarter-century ago.

headline.print_headline: No. 2 South Carolina Looking to Slow Down UConn's Stewart
headline.main: No. 2 South Carolina Looking to Slow Down UConn's Stewart

snippet: South Carolina coach Dawn Staley thinks Connecticut's Breanna Stewart is a sublime player and competitor who has transcended the game. Staley would know, having redefined point guard play as the game's best player a quarter-century ago....
